link.Abstract: If we learned one thing from Liam Hemsworth's Details interview, it's that the dude is easily distracted by squirrels. Funny, we're easily distracted by Liam Hemsworth. But who's cuter?! We're pretty sure we know how the Hunger Games star will be voting, but we'll let you decide. For each slide, cast your vote!
link.title: Who's Cuter: Liam Hemsworth or a Squirrel?

content.div:
Fans who are starving for The Hunger Games can win tickets to the Canadian premieres in their cities.

The screenings are being held March 19 in Toronto, March 21 in Vancouver, and March 22 in Ottawa, Edmonton, Calgary, Winnipeg, Halifax and Victoria.

At the Toronto screening - the Canadian red carpet premiere - stars Josh Hutcherson (Peeta), Liam Hemsworth (Gale) and Alexander Ludwig (Cato) will attend. Ludwig will also be at the premiere in his hometown of Vancouver.

Tickets can be won at Facebook.com/AllianceFilms and on Twitter @AllianceFilms.

The Hunger Games opens wide on Friday, March 23. Advance tickets are available for purchase through the Alliance Films Facebook page or Cineplex.com, EmpireTheatres.com and MovieTickets.com.
